!output bin
shru2_64 111111111111111111111111111111b
shru2_64 11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111b
shru2_64 101010101b
!output signed
shru2_64 8
shru2_64 200200
shru2_64 -1
shru2_64 0x00000000ffffffff
shru2_64 0xffffffffffffffff
shru2_64 1
!output hex
shru2_64 0xe1e1e1e1e1e1e1e1
shru2_64 0x1e1e1e1e1e1e1e1e
shru2_64 0xf0f0f0f0f0f0f0f0
!quit
